gr::Texture Class Reference
[Graphics rendering library]

#include <Texture.h>

Inheritance diagram for gr::Texture:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class for platform dependent 2D textures.


Public Member Functions

Member Function Documentation

virtual void gr::Texture::blt (  int  x,
int  y,
const void *  data,
int  pitch,
int  w,
int  h,
const SurfaceFormat &  fmt,
const void *  pal,
const SurfaceFormat &  palfmt
)  [pure virtual]
 

Sets all pixels of this texture image.

Texture must be unlocked before the method is called.

Parameters:
x Destination offset x.
y Destination offset y.
data Pointer to source image data.
pitch Distance in bytes from start of source image scanline to start of next scanline.
w Width of source image in pixels.
h Height of source image in pixels.
fmt Pixel format of source image.
pal Palette of source image (if any).
palfmt Palette format of source image (or SURFACE_UNKNOWN).

virtual void gr::Texture::clear (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Clears texture surface.

Texture must be unlocked before the method is called.

Returns surface pixel storage format of this texture.

Implements gr::BaseTexture.

Returns access to locked data.

Requires that texture is locked before calling this.
